author: Associated Press
title: Jazz great Ellis Marsalis Jr. dead at 85; fought virus
description: Ellis Marsalis Jr., jazz pianist, teacher and patriarch of a New Orleans musical clan that includes famed performer sons Wynton and Branford, has died after battling pneumonia brought by the new coronavirus, one of his sons said late Wednesday.
content:
